committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to designate the first Tuesday after the first Monday in November, in every even-numbered year, as a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Designates the first Monday in November, in every even-numbered year, "Federal Election Day." Makes such day a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to designate the first Tuesday after the first Monday in November, in every even-numbered year, as a legal public holiday.
